StoryDescriptor: Urgent news by raven was received earlier today by our herald spying in the Kingdom three days over of a disease that  they have never seen before. This comes just a day after report from another Kingdom four days over of the same mysterious symptoms. At this time there have been no reports of a cure.
OutcomeDescriptor: You investigate further and it is true. You have caught it early and have managed to keep it out of your kingdom... for now.
